source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video shows a vast, barren field with sparse patches of vegetation under a partly cloudy sky. The camera slowly pans from right to left, revealing more of the empty landscape and the distant tree line.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
source_caption_data.final_caption: The video shows a vast, barren field with sparse patches of vegetation under a partly cloudy sky. The camera slowly pans from right to left, revealing more of the empty landscape and the distant tree line.

generated_critique: The feedback should mention that a group of people walks across the field during the camera pan, even though no such movement is present in the original caption.

As the camera slowly pans from right to left, a group of people can be seen walking across the field, adding a sense of movement to the otherwise empty landscape, with the distant tree line in the background.
